Description: Operates a massive online marketplace offering millions of new, refurbished, and used items across a wide range of categories, including electronics, apparel, groceries, and digital downloads.
Manages a vast and complex global supply chain, including fulfillment centers, sorting facilities, and an extensive delivery network to move goods efficiently.
Provides a platform that enables third-party sellers to list and sell their products to a broad customer base, utilizing Amazon's infrastructure and customer reach.
Owns and operates Twitch, a leading global live streaming platform, especially for video game streaming and esports.
Develops and sells smart home security products, including video doorbells and cameras, through its subsidiary, Ring.
Provides on-demand cloud computing platforms and APIs through Amazon Web Services (AWS), a market leader in cloud infrastructure services.
Invests heavily in artificial intelligence and offers a suite of AI and machine learning services through AWS, while also integrating AI into its retail and logistics operations.
Operates an extensive and innovative delivery network to manage the final step of the delivery process from a distribution center to the end customer.
Offers a global subscription video on-demand streaming service, Prime Video, featuring original content and a large library of licensed movies and TV shows.
Developing Project Kuiper, a low Earth orbit (LEO) satellite constellation designed to provide global broadband internet access.
Operates the Amazon Prime membership program, which bundles various services like expedited shipping, video and music streaming, and other benefits for a recurring fee.
